title: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore - Orchard Road Location
blurb: Located in Orchard Road, Singapore's shopping hub.
description: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore is located at the beginning of Orchard Road, Singapore's premier shopping destination. The cafe offers a family-friendly dining experience with a rock 'n' roll atmosphere. It features a restaurant, bar, and a Rock Shop where you can purchase Hard Rock Cafe merchandise. The venue is accessible by car and public transportation, with parking readily available for cars. While bus parking facilities are not available, the central location makes it easy to reach. Enjoy classic American cuisine and live music in a vibrant setting suitable for families and music lovers of all ages. The cafe provides a unique blend of dining and entertainment.
full_address: Orchard Road is the Shopping hub of Singapore

title: Hard Rock Cafe: World-Famous Dining Experience
blurb: Mouth-watering International selections and American classics.
description: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore offers a range of mouth-watering International selections, including American classics like the Legendary® Burger and local favorites such as Chilli Crab Dip. Customers can enjoy the Best Burgers and Ribs in Singapore, paired with tasty cocktails and mocktails. The cafe provides a relaxed atmosphere where guests can sip ice-cold beer, fine wine, and spirits while enjoying amazing food and great company. It's a family-friendly dining experience suitable for all ages, offering a diverse menu to cater to different tastes and preferences.
datetime_display: Mon - Sun 11:30 AM - 9:30 PM DAILY: 11AM - 11PM (Last order at 10PM)

title: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore World Burger Tour
blurb: Embark on a flavour-packed journey with our Burger Tour!
description: Embark on a flavour-packed journey with our World Burger Tour – Top 5 Edition, featuring signature burgers from New York, Tampa, Milan, Budapest, and Barcelona. Each creation is stacked with bold ingredients and global inspiration, served with seasoned fries. Don’t miss your chance to try them all! Hard Rock Cafe Singapore (Cuscaden outlet) offers a vibrant dining experience with a menu that caters to all tastes. Enjoy classic American cuisine, live music, and a rock 'n' roll atmosphere. Perfect for families and music lovers alike, it's a great place to create lasting memories.

title: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore - Cuscaden Road Venue
blurb: Enjoy live music and great deals every Thursday night!
description: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore (Cuscaden outlet) offers a vibrant atmosphere with live music by Jacklyn & Cheng every Thursday from 7:30 PM. Enjoy the Thirsty Thursday deal with 5 pints of Carlsberg for $35++. The venue provides a perfect night out with great food, drinks, and entertainment. Call or WhatsApp to book your table. Terms and conditions apply. The venue is known for its rock and roll theme, American cuisine, and a lively ambiance suitable for families and music enthusiasts.
venue_name: Hard Rock Cafe Singapore, Cuscaden Road
